text: The Hammond Ciesar All-Americans were a professional basketball team that competed in the National Basketball League. They were based in Hammond, Indiana, and played in the Hammond Civic Center for home games. ==History== The team was founded in 1936 in Whiting, Indiana as the Whiting Ciesar All- Americans, where they played in the Midwest Basketball Conference. They changed their name in for the 1938-39 season to the Hammond Ciesar All- Americans, and joined the National Basketball League. They disbanded after the 1940-41 season. ==References== Category:Basketball teams in Indiana Category:National Basketball League (United States) teams Category:Basketball teams established in 1936 Category:1936 establishments in Indiana Category:Hammond, Indiana Category:1941 disestablishments in Indiana Category:Sports clubs disestablished in 1941
title: Hammond Ciesar All-Americans
